bibl.title: The Roots of Egyptian Christianity
bibl.note: Introduction. - Funerary Inscriptions. - Topography. - Liturgical Formulations. - Acclamations. - Forms of Titles. - Epithets for the Deceased. - Symbols. - Titles and Professions. - Summary.
Brown S. Kent, Coptic and Greek Inscriptions from Christian Egypt: A Brief Review.
Birger A. Pearson and James E. Goehring (Edd.), The Roots of Egyptian Christianity (Philadelphia, 1986) pp. 26-41.
